name: 100 Black Men of London
description: A community-based charity led by Black men delivering programmes and activities focused on mentoring, education, economic empowerment, health & wellness and leadership. Free programmes and activities are run for youth, parents, men and women.

name: Act4Addenbrooke's
description: Raises funds to support Addenbrooke's and the Rosie hospitals.

name: CoppaFeel
description: Breast Cancer charity.

name: Imkaan
description: A black feminist organisation which addresses violence against women and girls. A second-tier organisation which represents frontline, specialist and dedicated Black and minoritised women's organisations that work to prevent and respond to violence against women and girls.

name: Inquest
description: The only charity in England and Wales that provides independent, free legal and advice service to bereaved people on inquest procedures and their rights in the coroner's court and the civil courts. Their specialist casework includes deaths in police and prison custody, immigration detention, mental health settings and deaths involving multi-agency failings or where wider issues of state and corporate accountability are in question

name: Olly's Future
description: Aims to advance the education of the public on the causes, effects and prevention of suicide, especially concerning young people.

name: Show Racism the Red Card
description: An anti-racist educational charity which produces educational resources and delivers educational workshops to young people and adults in schools and workplaces.

name: Sing Inside
description: Delivers singing workshops in prisons, connecting volunteers from the local community with their local prison communities.

name: Stand Against Racism & Inequality
description: Aims to tackle racism and inequalities for people with protected characteristics.

name: Stop Hate UK
description: Raises awareness and understanding of discrimination and hate crime, encourages its reporting  and supports individuals and  communities it affects.

name: Albert Kennedy Trust
description: LGBTQ+ homelessness.

name: Breast Cancer Care and Breast Cancer Now
description: Pink Week charity.

name: Breast Cancer Haven
description: Pink Week charity.

name: Cambridge Women's Aid
description: Pink Week charity.

name: DHIverse
description: Local cause supporting victims of domestic abuse.

name: Teens Unite Fighting Cancer
description: Sexual Health with an additional focus on BAME communities.

name: Whitworth Trust
description: Pink Week charity.

name: Jimmy's Cambridge
description: Local cause supporting vulnerable women.

name: Wintercomfort
description: Supporting the homeless in Cambridge through the distribution of material goods.

name: Stonewall Equality Limited
description: Supporting the homeless in Cambridge with mental health support.

name: British Red Cross
description: To support LGBT+ communities in Cambridge and in the UK.

name: Salvation Army
description: To support the relief effort for the Russia–Ukraine War.

name: iF Charity
description: To support the relief effort for the Russia–Ukraine War.

name: Act4Addenbrooke's
description: Raise funds to aid humanitarian efforts across the Gaza strip

name: Save the Children
description: Raises funds to support Addenbrooke's and the Rosie hospitals.

name: Disasters Emergency Committee
description: Works to support education, mental health, and to provide safe spaces for children.

name: Christian Aid
description: Coordinates and launches appeals to provide emergency aid and rapid relief to people in disasters and humanitarian crisis.

name: Islamic Relief
description: Provides faith-inspired work which tackles poverty and supports sustainable development and disaster relief.

name: UNICEF Yemen & Sudan appeals
description: To provide essentials to vulnerable children in the current conflicts in both Yemen and Sudan

name: Water Aid
description: International NGO which raises funds for clean water, sanitation and hygiene.

name: RSPB
description: UK charity which raises funds and awareness about nature conservation
